name.baseName: Preparation of New Recycled Asphalt Mixture ; RAP1560kg/m3 (60% by volume), New Asphalt 46.2kg/m3, Steel Slag 706.2kg/m3, Copper Slag 460.2kg/m3, Recycled Micronized Powder 67.6kg/m3
制备新型再生沥青混合料 ; RAP1560kg/m3（体积掺量60%），新沥青46.2kg/m3，钢渣706.2kg/m3，铜渣460.2kg/m3，再生微粉67.6kg/m3

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Using steel slag and copper slag as recycled coarse and fine aggregates, and adding different amounts of milling material (RAP) to prepare new recycled asphalt mixtures
以钢渣、铜渣作为再生粗、细骨料，并添加不同掺量的铣刨料（RAP）制备新型再生沥青混合料

technology.technologicalApplicability: The process is designed for the production of a novel regenerated asphalt mixture for application in roadway construction and maintenance. The mixture incorporates a high volume of Reclaimed Asphalt Pavement (RAP) at 1560 kg/m3 (volume content of 60%), new asphalt at 46.2 kg/m3, steel slag at 706.2 kg/m3, and copper slag at 460.2 kg/m3, along with recycled filler at 67.6 kg/m3. Steel and copper slags are utilized as coarse and fine aggregates respectively, with varying proportions of RAP to fabricate new types of reconstructed asphalt mixtures with associated carbon emissions factors (LCI results).
该工艺旨在生产新型再生沥青混合料，用于道路建设和维护。混合料中包含高体积比的铣刨再生沥青(RAP) 1560 kg/m3（体积掺量60%），新沥青46.2 kg/m3，钢渣706.2 kg/m3，铜渣460.2 kg/m3，以及再生填料67.6 kg/m3。钢渣和铜渣分别作为粗、细集料，结合不同比例的RAP，制备具有关联碳排放因子（LCI结果）的新型重构沥青混合料。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 雷斌,周健英,余林杰,晏育松.利用废料制备再生沥青混合料全生命周期的环境效益评价[J].新型建筑材料,2023,50(5):56-60.
雷斌,周健英,余林杰,晏育松.利用废料制备再生沥青混合料全生命周期的环境效益评价[J].新型建筑材料,2023,50(5):56-60.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this industrial process data set for Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), ensure accurate representation of material proportions as detailed for the specific regenerated asphalt mixture. Consider regional availability and transportation impacts for steel slag, copper slag, and RAP. The data set's methodological advice includes accounting for the end-of-life phase, ensuring assumptions on recycling rates of materials within the asphalt mixture, and potential recovery rates of aggregates. Operational energy and emissions during the mixture's application should also be included in the LCA model.
在使用该工业过程数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）时，确保准确反映特定再生沥青混合料中的材料比例。考虑钢渣、铜渣和RAP的区域可获得性及其运输影响。数据集的方法学建议包括计入生命周期终期阶段管理，确保就沥青混合料内部材料的回收率和集料的潜在回收率作出假设。应在LCA模型中包括混合料应用过程中的操作能源和排放。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
